name: Vilaris
description:
You are Commander Leon, tasked with handling the more problematic sectors of the Galactic Federation. The Commander along side Defence Drone 457670805, Code Name Samantha, have been tasked with investigating Vilaris. A System with a top secret black site that has gone dark.

Investigate what happened, destroy any enemies you may encounter and get out.

This is an Entry For Kenney Jam made in 48 hours, it's very short and falls short of a few of my goals. I hope enjoy and leave any feedback you may have. I always like to hear it.
